answeredQuestions.target-users: TeamBot CLI users, workflow designers, automation engineers
answeredQuestions.core-problem: Users cannot easily reference specific agent outputs with automatic wait-for-completion
answeredQuestions.success-metrics: Syntax usability, zero race conditions, clear status visibility, documentation clarity
answeredQuestions.testing-approach: Hybrid - TDD for parser, code-first for integration
answeredQuestions.scope-boundaries: In: $agent syntax, parser, waiting, status. Out: field-level refs, persistence, GUI

referencesProcessed.keyFindings: Problem definition, goals, success criteria, risks, syntax comparison
Current pipeline parsing with PIPELINE_PATTERN, Command dataclass structure
OutputInjector prepends parent outputs with section headers
